Package jdr.generator.api.characters

Class CharactersController

java.lang.Object
jdr.generator.api.characters.CharactersController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/characters") public class CharactersController extends Object
Controller for managing character-related operations.

  • Constructor Details

    • CharactersController

      CharactersController(CharacterDetailsService characterDetailsService, GeminiService geminiService, OpenaiService openaiService, FreepikService freepikService, PdfGeneratorService pdfGeneratorService)
      Constructor for the CharactersController.
      Parameters:
      geminiService - Service for interacting with the Gemini API.
      characterDetailsService - Service for managing character details.
      openaiService - Service for interacting with the OpenAI API.
      freepikService - Service for interacting with the Freepik API.

  • Method Details

    • updateCharacter

      @PutMapping("/details/{id}") @Transactional public CharacterDetailsEntity updateCharacter(@PathVariable Long id, @RequestBody CharacterFullModel updatedCharacter)
      Updates an existing character's details.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the character to update.
      updatedCharacter - The updated character data.
      Returns:
      The updated CharacterDetailsEntity.

    • deleteCharacter

      @DeleteMapping("/{id}") @ResponseStatus(NO_CONTENT) public void deleteCharacter(@PathVariable Long id)
      Deletes a character by their ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the character to delete.

    • getAllCharacters

      @GetMapping public List<CharacterDetailsModel> getAllCharacters()
      Retrieves a list of all character details.
      Returns:
      A list of CharacterDetailsModel.

    • getAllCharactersFull

      @GetMapping("/full") public List<CharacterFullModel> getAllCharactersFull()
      Retrieves a list of all full character models.
      Returns:
      A list of CharacterFullModel.

    • generate

      @RequestMapping(value="/generate", method=POST) @ResponseStatus(OK) @CrossOrigin(origins="http://localhost:5173,http://localhost:3080") public CharacterDetailsModel generate(@RequestBody DefaultContextJson data)
      Generates a new character based on the provided context.
      Parameters:
      data - The context data for character generation.
      Returns:
      The generated CharacterDetailsModel.

    • illustrate

      @PutMapping("/illustrate") @ResponseStatus(OK) @CrossOrigin(origins="http://localhost:5173,http://localhost:3080") public byte[] illustrate(@RequestBody RegenerateIllustrationRequestDto request)
      Regenerates an illustration for an existing character. This method replaces the old POST /illustrate to use PUT and an ID. It takes the character's ID and triggers the regeneration process using the character's existing context and details to build the prompt.
      Parameters:
      request - The request body containing the character ID and the desired draw style.
      Returns:
      An array of bytes representing the regenerated image.

    • stats

      @RequestMapping(value="/stats/{id}", method=POST) @ResponseStatus(OK) @CrossOrigin(origins="http://localhost:5173,http://localhost:3080") public String stats(@PathVariable Long id)
      Retrieves statistics for a specific character.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the character.
      Returns:
      A string containing the character's statistics.

    • getCharacterPdf

      @GetMapping(value="/pdf/generate/{id}", produces="application/pdf") @CrossOrigin(origins="http://localhost:5173,http://localhost:3080") public byte[] getCharacterPdf(@PathVariable Long id)
      PDF Generation
      Parameters:
      id - L'ID du personnage pour lequel générer le PDF.
      Returns:
      byte[] du PDF généré
